title: King's Entry XVIBII
author: Bravazo Constanma
story: This is a basic treatise on the war of the anime openings.  On one side, you have the macross agents vying for air supremacy.  They are to be contested by the Trigun Revolver System with our Lain Electric Counter-Countermeasure System.  And if you truly want to change the world with the Inuyasha Amaterasu no Hitorikiri, then you must ensure your dominance and safety with the fairness and clandestine of the Chobits Forbidden Shield.
